definitions.title: vb.
definitions.body: kneel, bless (NH id.; Ar. baraka; Eth. baraka:: Aram. [[בְּרֵח]] brek (praise), Palm. esp. in [[בריך שמו לעלמא]] Vog:Palm. 74 ff. cf. 94, 144)—
kneel down (so Ar. Syr. Eth.): [[וַיִּבְרַח עַל־בִרְכָּיו]] and he kneeled upon his knees 2Ch 6:13; ´[[נִבְרְכָה לפני י]] let us kneel before Yahweh Ps 95:6.

definitions.title: c.
definitions.body: things: [[בָּרוּח פרי]] [[בטנך]] blessed be the fruit of thy womb De 28:4 cf. De 28:5, 1Sa 25:33, Pr 5:18.

definitions.title: Niph.
definitions.body: Pf. [[נִבְרְכוּ]] Ge 12:3, Ge 18:18, Ge 28:14 (J) bless oneself (cf.

bless God, adore with bended knees: acc. ´[[ברך י]] Ge 24:48 (J) De 8:10, Ju Jdg 5:2, Jdg 5:9, 1Ch 29:10, 1Ch 29:20, 2Ch 20:26, 2Ch 31:8, Ne 9:5, Ps 16:7, Ps 26:12, Ps 34:2, Ps 63:5, Ps 103:20, Ps 103:21, Ps 103:22, Ps 115:18, Ps 134:1, Ps 134:2, Ps 135:19, Ps 135:20, Ps 145:2, Ps 145:10; [[ברכי]] ´[[נפשׁי את י]] Ps 103:1, Ps 103:2, Ps 103:22, Ps 104:1, Ps 104:35; [[ברך שׁם]] bless the name of Yahweh Ne 9:5, Ps 96:2, Ps 100:4, Ps 145:1, Ps 145:21; [[ברך]] [[אלהים]] Jos 22:33, Ps 66:8, Ps 68:27 (doubtless for an original [[יהוה]]), with [[לְ]] 1Ch 29:20; [[מְבָרֵח אָוׇן]] Is 66:3 (of idolatrous worship).

definitions.title: b.
definitions.body: things: Sabbath Ge 2:3, Ex 20:11 (P); field Ge 27:27 (E); bread Ex 23:25 (E); work De 28:12, Job 1:10 cf. De 33:11, Ps 65:11, Ps 132:15.

men bless men: priests & kings ´[[בשׁם י]] De 10:8, De 21:5, 2Sa 6:18, 1Ch 16:2, 1Ch 23:13, Ps 129:8; Melchizedek Abraham Ge 14:19; Moses De 33:1, Ex 12:32, Ex 39:43; Joshua Jos 14:13, Jos 22:6, Jos 22:7; priests Le 9:22, Le 9:23, Nu 6:23, De 27:12, Jos 8:33, 2Ch 30:27, Ps 118:26; Solomon 1Ki 8:14, 1Ki 8:55 ( = 2Ch 6:3); David 2Sa 6:20 (= 1Ch 16:43) 2Sa 19:40; Eli 1Sa 2:20; Balaam Nu 22:6, Nu 23:11, Nu 23:20, Nu 23:25, Nu 24:10; fathers, esp. on death-bed Ge 27:4 + 12 t. Ge 27 (all JE) Ge 28:1, Ge 28:6 (P) Ge 32:1 (E) Ge 48:9 (P) Ge 48:15, Ge 48:20, Ge 49:28 (J) 2Sa 13:25; in consecrating a sacrifice 1Sa 9:13.
salute, greet, with an invocation of blessing (stronger than [[שׁלום]]): [[בך יברך ישׂראל]] with thee will Israel bless Ge 48:20 (E).

definitions.title: f.
definitions.body: congratulations for prosperity Ge 12:3 (J) Ge 27:29, Nu 24:9 (E) 1Ki 1:47, Ps 49:19, Ps 62:5.

bless, with the antithetical meaning curse (Thes) from the greeting in departing, saying adieu to, taking leave of; but rather a blessing overdone and so really a curse as in vulgar English as well as in the Shemitic cognates: 1Ki 21:10, 1Ki 21:13, Job 1:5, Job 1:11, Job 2:5, Job 2:9, Ps 10:3.
pass. to be blessed, adored: ´[[שׁם י]] Job 1:21, Ps 113:2
have prosperity invoked, by Balaam Nu 22:6.

definitions.title: Hiph.
definitions.body: [[וַיַּבְרֵח חַגְּמַלִּים]] and he made his camels kneel Ge 24:11 (J).

definitions.title: Hithp.
definitions.body: [[הִתְבָּרֵח]] De 29:18 + 3 t.; Impf. [[יִתְבָּרֵח]] Is 65:16, Ps 72:17; Pt. [[מִתְבָּרֵח]] Is 65:16; —bless oneself, congratulate onself [[בלבבו]] in his heart De 29:18; [[בזרעך]] with or by (cf. [[בְּ]] III.

definitions.title: 2. d
definitions.body: ) thy seed (invoke for oneself the blessing of the see of Abraham) Ge 22:18, Ge 26:4 (J); by the Messianic king Ps 72:17; [[באלהי אמן]] Is 65:16; by ´[[י]] Je 4:2.
